Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: ランドグリーズ
Entry.EnglishText: Randgriz

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア
Entry.EnglishText: Claire

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の子
Entry.EnglishText: Girl

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: サニイタウン
Entry.EnglishText: Sunnytown

Entry.JapaneseText: 装備品屋・道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Weapon Shop - Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: 宿屋・食材屋
Entry.EnglishText: Inn - Grocery Store

Entry.JapaneseText: あの……
Entry.EnglishText: Excuse me...

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さんは、ヒューマの女の子を 探していらっしゃるんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is it true that you're searching for Huma girls?

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてそれを？
Entry.EnglishText: How did you know?

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さんが、港で軍の方と 話しているのが聞こえたんです。 もしかしてその子というのは、 さらわれたのでは……？
Entry.EnglishText: I overheard you talking to the soldier at the harbor. By any chance, were those girls kidnapped...?

Entry.JapaneseText: おばさん、 何か知ってるのかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you know something, ma'am?

Entry.JapaneseText: 実は…… 私も娘を、サレとトーマという 二人組にさらわれたのです。 ちょうど昨日の事でした……
Entry.EnglishText: Well... Just yesterday, my own daughter was taken by two people called Saleh and Tohma...

Entry.JapaneseText: そいつらはどこへ？ 船か？
Entry.EnglishText: Where were they headed? Did they get on a boat?

Entry.JapaneseText: いいえ、私の娘や 他の娘さんたちを連れて、 西へ向かいました。
Entry.EnglishText: No, they took my daughter and the other Huma girls and went westward.

Entry.JapaneseText: 西？ という事は、 テルアラ街道の方か。
Entry.EnglishText: West? That must mean they're taking the Tel'Alla Highroad.

Entry.JapaneseText: 昨日か……急げば、 追いつけるかもしれないな。
Entry.EnglishText: Yesterday, huh... If we hurry, we might catch up to them!

Entry.JapaneseText: もしその娘さんを助けに行かれるなら、 皆さんの力で、娘も……<Hilda>も 一緒に救い出してくださいませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: If you're going to rescue the girls, could you please save my dear <Hilda>?

Entry.JapaneseText: 娘さんの名前は<Hilda>と？
Entry.EnglishText: Your daughter's name is <Hilda>?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ。お願いです!! どうか、娘を……
Entry.EnglishText: Yes. I beg of you! Please, save my daughter...

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、絶対に連れ戻してみせる！ おばさんは、ここで待っててくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: Don't worry, ma'am! We'll get her back, just wait here.

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがとうございます……
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you so much...

Entry.JapaneseText: 急ごうぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Let's book it!

Entry.JapaneseText: それでは発表する。 来たる<Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>に、 女王陛下のお披露目の式が 執り行われる運びとなった。
Entry.EnglishText: Attention, I have an announcement to make. On the next <Blue>Day of Goldba<White>, Her Majesty the Queen's inauguration ceremony will commence.

Entry.JapaneseText: お披露目の式、だって。 どうして<Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>なのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: An inauguration ceremony, eh? Why on the <Blue>Day of Goldba<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>は 古代の勇者ゴルドバが、人々と共に カレギア王国を興し、その初代国王に 即位した日を記念した祝日だ。
Entry.EnglishText: The <Blue>Day of Goldba<White> celebrates when the ancient hero, Goldba, established the Kingdom of Callegea alongside his people, and ascended to the throne as its first king.

Entry.JapaneseText: それになぞらえて お披露目の式をやろうという 陛下のお考えなのだろう。
Entry.EnglishText: The Queen probably intends to pattern her inauguration ceremony after the one held by her ancestor so long ago.

Entry.JapaneseText: ラドラス王崩御後、大事があり、 女王陛下におかれては略式の戴冠式のみで 済まされていたが、ようやく国が落ち着き、 このたびのお披露目と相成った。
Entry.EnglishText: Because of the pressing matters following King Ladras's passing, only a modest coronation for our Queen was held. Since things have calmed down, there will now be a proper inauguration ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: それに伴う警備の一環として、 お披露目の式が終了するまで、 バビログラードを除くすべての港を封鎖し、 首都バルカとの往来を禁止している。
Entry.EnglishText: In accordance with this, as one measure of security, all ports with the exception of Babilograd will be closed, and traffic to and from Balka will be strictly prohibited.

Entry.JapaneseText: 港が封鎖されていたのは、 そういう事だったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: So that's why the ports have been closed off?

Entry.JapaneseText: いや…… 警備のためだけにしては、 物々しい雰囲気を感じたが……
Entry.EnglishText: No... It seems much too restrictive to be a mere security measure.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>王の盾<White>の動きと 関係が……？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>'s actions have something to do with it?

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ…… そうかもしれん。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes... That seems likely.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……女の子を集めてるコトと、 <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>のお披露目の儀式に 何か関係があるのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Maybe kidnapping the girls and the inauguration ceremony on the <Blue>Day of Goldba<White> are somehow connected?

Entry.JapaneseText: 儀式のために 女の子を集めてるって事？
Entry.EnglishText: So they're kidnapping the girls for the ceremony?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何だかわからないけど、 イヤな予感がするぜ……
Entry.EnglishText: Something about this gives me a bad feeling...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>まで もう、そんなに時間がない……
Entry.EnglishText: There isn't much time until the <Blue>Day of Goldba<White> either...

Entry.JapaneseText: スージーの話が真実なら、 さらわれたヒューマの娘たちは、 最終的にはカレギア城へ連れて いかれるはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: If Susie's story is true, then the final destination of all the kidnapped girls should be Callegea Castle.

Entry.JapaneseText: じゃあ、姉貴も クレアさんも……
Entry.EnglishText: Then, Selena and Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: バルカへ急ごう。 バビログラードからなら 船が出ているという話だったな。
Entry.EnglishText: We need to get to Balka. From what he said, we should be able to take a boat from Babilograd.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ…… だが、楽な道程じゃないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Right... However, it won't be a walk in the park.

Entry.JapaneseText: ここから バビログラードへ行くには、 クロダダク砂漠を 越えなくてはいけない。
Entry.EnglishText: In order to get to Babilograd from here, we need to cross the Kurodadaku Desert first.

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、砂漠は水もないし、暑いから それなりの覚悟は必要だネ！ 準備がすんだら出発しよう！
Entry.EnglishText: Yep. There's barely any water there and it's really hot, so be prepared for that! We can leave once everyone's ready!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……<Cyan>月の正位置<White>…… 不安……疑惑……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Cyan>Upright Moon<White>... Anxiety... and Doubt.

Entry.JapaneseText: ん？
Entry.EnglishText: Hm?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何でもないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's nothing.

Entry.JapaneseText: よっしゃ、行こうぜ!!
Entry.EnglishText: All right then, off we go!

Entry.JapaneseText: よくぞ、ここまでたどり着いた。
Entry.EnglishText: You have done well to come this far.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたが聖獣ランドグリーズなのか？ ここは<Blue>幻の島<White>なのかよ!?
Entry.EnglishText: Are you the Sacred Beast Randgriz? Then is this really the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White>?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 我がもとへ来るが良い。
Entry.EnglishText: Come before me.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの先に、<Yellow>聖獣<White>が……？
Entry.EnglishText: So just before us lies the <Yellow>Sacred Beast<White>...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 静かだな…… これが平和ってヤツか？
Entry.EnglishText: It's quiet... So I guess this is what peace is like?

Entry.JapaneseText: 元のカレギアに 戻ったのよね……？
Entry.EnglishText: Callegea has gone back to the way it was, right...?

Entry.JapaneseText: おそらく…… いや、そうであって 欲しいものだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Most likely it has... Or perhaps we just want that to be the case.

Entry.JapaneseText: 戻ってないのは……
Entry.EnglishText: The only thing that hasn't returned to normal is...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私……だけみたいね。
Entry.EnglishText: Myself... Or so it seems.

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: ん？ どうした<Mao>？ なんか元気ねえな？
Entry.EnglishText: Huh? What's the matter, <Mao>? What's got you down?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ずっと言おうと思ってて 言い出せなかったんだけど…… 実はボク……
Entry.EnglishText: There's something that I've been wanting to tell you guys for a while now, but I just haven't been able to get the words out. The truth is, I...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>じゃ……ないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not... <Yellow>Human<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマでもガジュマでも…… ハーフでもなくって……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not a Huma, or a Gajuma, or even a Half...

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣たちが<Yellow>ヒト<White>の姿に似せて、 ボクを作り出したんだって。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm a creation of the Sacred Beasts, made in the image of <Yellow>Man<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Yellow>ヒト<White>じゃ…… ないんだってさ……
Entry.EnglishText: So that makes me... not <Yellow>Human<White>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……冗談よね？
Entry.EnglishText: ...Surely, you're joking?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ボクは聖獣たちに <Yellow>ヒト<White>を監視する<Red>目<White>として、 この世界に送り込まれた。
Entry.EnglishText: They sent me out into the world of <Yellow>Man<White> so that I could be their <Red>eyes<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから、記憶喪失じゃなくて、 最初から記憶が無かった。
Entry.EnglishText: So I didn't really lose my memories, since I never had any to begin with.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣とは違うの？
Entry.EnglishText: And you're not one of the Sacred Beasts?

Entry.JapaneseText: うん、ボクは自分で考えて、 自分で行動してる。
Entry.EnglishText: Nope, I think on my own and act on my own.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣たちから命令されてる ワケでもないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: And I don't receive orders from the Sacred Beasts either.

Entry.JapaneseText: だから…… みんなに聞きたいんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: So, I want to ask you guys something.

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなボクだけど、 これからも一緒に行って いいのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Are you guys okay with me still travelling alongside you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>…… おまえはおまえだ。
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>... You're you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣に作られようと…… どんな姿をしていようと…… おまえは、おまえだ。
Entry.EnglishText: ...No matter if you were made by the Sacred Beasts, and no matter what you appear to be... You are you.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……クレア、おまえもだ……
Entry.EnglishText: The same goes for you, Claire.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 向こうだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Over there!

Entry.JapaneseText: 東のほうから なにやら聞こえるね……
Entry.EnglishText: I can hear something coming from the east...

Entry.JapaneseText: 雷雲でも近づいて 来てるのかね……
Entry.EnglishText: Is there gonna be a storm soon?

Entry.JapaneseText: 特別警戒中だ……って、 何だかやり過ぎのような 気もするな……
Entry.EnglishText: This "special surveillance" thingy feels kind of... excessive...

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな地鳴りぐらいで 騒ぎ立ててもらっては困る。 静かに家にいろ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's no need to make a fuss out of a small earthquake like this. Just be quiet and stay home.

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの連れのヒューマを 屋内に入れろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Send the Huma with you back indoors!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマは 屋内に入っていろ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Huma are supposed to stay indoors!!

Entry.JapaneseText: この音…… 津波でも来るんじゃ……!?
Entry.EnglishText: This sound... Is there a tidal wave coming...!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 津波なんて来たら、この街は 一発で沈んじまうよ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: This city will be gone in a blink of an eye if it does come!!

Entry.JapaneseText: まったく…… 女の買い物は 長くていけねえや……
Entry.EnglishText: Sheesh, women do like taking their time shopping, don't they?

Entry.JapaneseText: ん？ ヒューマは外出禁止だろ？
Entry.EnglishText: Hm? Aren't you Huma supposed to be indoors?

Entry.JapaneseText: お船？ 私たちも乗せてくれるの？
Entry.EnglishText: A ship? Can I come with you, too?

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきのおねえちゃんたちが 話してたおばちゃん、 様子が変だったよね？
Entry.EnglishText: The old lady that the girls were talking to earlier was pretty strange, isn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: さっきのおにいちゃんたちが 話してたおばちゃん、 様子が変だったよね？
Entry.EnglishText: The old lady that the guys were talking to earlier was pretty strange, isn't she?

Entry.JapaneseText: かくれんぼの 一番いい隠れ場所って 家の中か……水の中よね♪
Entry.EnglishText: The best places to hide in when playing hide-and-seek is probably inside a house... or under the water!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、女王様を見てみたいなぁ。
Entry.EnglishText: I wanna go see the Queen...

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、お母さんたちが、 王様がガジュマだって事を ホコリに思いなさいって！
Entry.EnglishText: Because my mom told me to boast about our King being a Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマはヒューマと 仲良くしちゃイケナイんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: It's impossible for Huma and Gajuma to get along together!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私だって、最近は ヒューマと遊んでないもん！
Entry.EnglishText: Even I haven't played with Huma lately!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとは お話しないって決めたの！
Entry.EnglishText: I decided that I'm never ever gonna talk to Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、ヒューマは ガジュマの敵だって みんなが言ってるもん！
Entry.EnglishText: Because everyone says that Huma are the enemies of Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、ホントは……ヒューマの おともだちと遊びたいの。
Entry.EnglishText: To be honest... I really want to play with my Huma friends.

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、ケンカしちゃったし、 お母さんたちも会っちゃダメって しかられるから……
Entry.EnglishText: But they only fight, and my mom doesn't really want me to be with them...

Entry.JapaneseText: お魚がどっかに 行っちゃったよ！
Entry.EnglishText: There's some fishes coming from somewhere!

Entry.JapaneseText: この音のせいで、 逃げちゃったのかな？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder if they're running away because of this sound?

Entry.JapaneseText: 私、お母さんたちに 叱られてもいいから、 ヒューマのおともだちと 遊びたいの……
Entry.EnglishText: I don't care if my mom gets angry at me, I wanna go play with my Huma friends!

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、みんな仲良しのほうが 楽しいんだもん……
Entry.EnglishText: Because it's more fun when everyone gets along...

Entry.JapaneseText: お魚さんはね、泳いでるところを 躍り食いするのが一番なの。
Entry.EnglishText: Fish are best eaten while they're still swimming!

Entry.JapaneseText: お船？ 私も乗りたい！
Entry.EnglishText: You're going on a ship? I wanna ride too!

Entry.JapaneseText: 逃げてた女の人？ 私、見たよ！ 南の入口の前を通り過ぎてったよ。
Entry.EnglishText: A girl running away? I saw one! She headed straight towards the south entrance.

Entry.JapaneseText: お家の中から見たの。 街の外には出てってないと思うよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I saw her go inside the house, I don't think she went out of town.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様のオヒロメのギシキ？ 私も見たい！
Entry.EnglishText: The Queen's In Awgyu Rayshun Ceremony? I wanna go and watch!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ!? 私、キラーイ！
Entry.EnglishText: I hate Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんでガジュマがキライか？ 私、そんなのわかんなーい！
Entry.EnglishText: Why do I hate Gajuma? I don't know!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……でも、羽が生えてたり 角が生えてたりして、私と 違うからかも……
Entry.EnglishText: But I think it's because we're different... because they have feathers and horns and stuff...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマ!? 私、前よりもっとキラーイ！
Entry.EnglishText: I hate Gajuma even more than before!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマは 仲良くしちゃダメなんだから！
Entry.EnglishText: After all, it's impossible for Huma and Gajuma to get along!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマがキライかって？ 私、とってもキラーイ！
Entry.EnglishText: Do you think I don't like Gajuma? Well, I really really hate them!

Entry.JapaneseText: だって、お母さんが ガジュマはイジワルで イヤな<Yellow>ヒト<White>たちだって……
Entry.EnglishText: Because my mommy told me that Gajuma are really mean <Yellow>people<White> who tease others...

Entry.JapaneseText: なぁに、この音!? 私、こわいよー！
Entry.EnglishText: What's this really scary sound!?

Entry.JapaneseText: 見て見て！ お魚さんが泳いでるの。 かーわいいー!!
Entry.EnglishText: Come and look! The little cute fishies are swimming!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>ランドグリーズのところへ 移動しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: Teleport to Randgriz's Shrine? Yes No
